name: First Sputnik - space battles in 3D
description:
The first artificial earth satellite entered near-earth orbit on October 4, 1957.

What awaited him in outer space? How did this desolate and cold world meet him?

We invite you to go on a fantastic space journey in near-earth orbit.

Dodge rockets and space debris, and tell the whole world about the first flight in space!

Improve your flying machine and develop the highest piloting skill in space.
